mapper.sql: EQUIPMENT_ID, ID, EQUIPMENT_NAME,TYPE, USER_NAME, USER_ID, CHANNEL_TEM, NUM_OF_CH,HEARTBEAT_ID,HEARTBEAT_NAME,ADDRESS, ADCODE, CADCODE, PADCODE, LNG_LAT, FRAME_STRU, ICON, CREATOR, CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 100 ), CREATE_TIME, 20 ) AS CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 100 ), UPDATE_TIME, 20 ) AS UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select: select EQUIPMENT_NAME from hq_equipment_info WHERE HEARTBEAT_ID = #{heartbeatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT EQUIPMENT_ID, EQUIPMENT_NAME, CHANNEL_TEM, NUM_OF_CH, u.USER_NAME, u.TEL FROM hq_equipment_info h, access_control_user u WHERE u.ID = H.USER_ID and HEARTBEAT_ID = #{heartbeatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FRAME_STRU = #{frameStru,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select TYPE from hq_equipment_info where EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into hq_equipment_info (EQUIPMENT_ID, EQUIPMENT_NAME,TYPE, USER_NAME, USER_ID, CHANNEL_TEM, NUM_OF_CH,HEARTBEAT_ID,HEARTBEAT_NAME ADDRESS, ADCODE, CADCODE, PADCODE, LNG_LAT, FRAME_STRU, ICON, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelTem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numOfCh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{heartbeatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{heartbeatName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cadcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{padcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lngLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameStru,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update hq_equipment_info
EQUIPMENT_NAME = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUM_OF_CH = #{numOfCh,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHANNEL_TEM = #{channelTem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEARTBEAT_NAME = #{heartbeatName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEARTBEAT_ID = #{heartbeatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADCODE = #{adcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CADCODE = #{cadcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PADCODE = #{padcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LNG_LAT = #{lngLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRAME_STRU = #{frameStru,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update hq_equipment_info set EQUIPMENT_NAME = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_TEM = #{channelTem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUM_OF_CH = #{numOfCh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HEARTBEAT_ID = #{heartbeatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEARTBEAT_NAME = #{heartbeatName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADCODE = #{adcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CADCODE = #{cadcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PADCODE = #{padcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LNG_LAT = #{lngLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRAME_STRU = #{frameStru,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
